title: SOUK 19: on the cutting edge of Montréal design
description: For its 19th edition, the SOUK, a major avant-garde and contemporary Montréal design showcase, makes a fresh start in a former textile factory at the heart of Mile-Ex’s Architects District. From November 29 to December 3, 2023, the crème de la crème of Montréal’s up-and-coming designers will come together in a new setting to showcase their wares in true SOUK fashion. In collaboration with Sid Lee Architecture, the SOUK will transform the floors of this vacant building into a raw, minimalist backdrop to artisanal ingenuity. This impressive project looks to promote local design and foster exchanges while honouring the history of the site and its industrial past.

title: Montréal's best holiday markets for 2023
description: Get out your Santa sacks! It’s that time of year when Christmas markets spring up all over town. We’ll be taking you from modern bazaars to temples for artisanal products to Christmas villages. See our suggestions on the best Christmas markets to fill up your recyclable baskets or bags with one-of-a-kind local gifts.

title: Montréal: City of lights
description: Montréal during the day and Montréal during the night is a tale of two cities. After dark, the city transforms: the bare stone walls of Old Montréal become history projected, while the Jacques-Cartier Bridge lights up in flashes of colour over the St. Lawrence River. Building facades in the entertainment district turn into movie screens, and the power of light to trick the eye gives some of Montréal’s first buildings all new life. Here’s just a few of Montréal’s light installations you won’t want to miss.

title: Stars shine on fun-to-watch 2023-’24 Habs team
description: Montréal is hockey, and when the city’s professional, National Hockey League (NHL) team the Montréal Canadiens are playing at home, there is a palpable energy that can be felt throughout the city. And excitement is high in 2023-’24 for the 24-time Stanley Cup champions, who have a few new faces on the ice, many of whom are homegrown rising stars.

title: Miracle Montréal: raise a glass to the holidays!
description: Miracle Montréal, everyone’s fav holiday pop-up bar, is back for a second edition to help you fill up on Christmas spirit(s). Enjoy your Christmas-themed tipple of choice in a fabulously decorated setting on Fleury Street from November 15 to December 26, 2023.
